channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New York eyes reviving congestion pricing toll before Trump takes office
item.description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul is considering ways to revive a program that would charge drivers a toll to enter parts of Manhattan before President-elect Donald Trump gets into office and blocks it.

item.title: Teachers in 3 Massachusetts communities continue strike over pay, paid parental leave
item.description: Teachers in three Massachusetts communities fighting for new contracts have pushed forward with their demands as parents brace for the possibility of more cancelled classes Tuesday.

item.title: Democrat Cleo Fields wins re-drawn Louisiana congressional district, flipping red seat blue
item.description: Democrat Cleo Fields has won a Louisiana congressional race in a recently redrawn second majority-Black district. That flips a once reliably Republican seat blue.
